name: fauces

the narrow passage from the mouth to the throat that is between the soft palate (= the soft tissue that forms the top of the mouth at the back) and the base of the tongue: Inspection of tonsils and fauces should be done to check for ulcers.the fauces Symptoms include inflammation of the fauces and pharynx.
